languages.text: "Э, нет, старик! Если мы утонем в варпе, ни один из наследничков Леди Теодоры нам уже не пригодится! Если Эдельтрад, как и я, еще не сдал ни разум, ни тело на милость варпу — значит, без нас еще продержится чуток!"

traits.locale_text: "Э, нет, старик! Если мы утонем в варпе, ни один из наследничков Леди Теодоры нам уже не пригодится! Если Эдельтрад, как и я, еще не сдал ни разум, ни тело на милость варпу — значит, без нас еще продержится чуток!"

languages.text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"
languages.original_text: "Э, нет, старик! Если мы утонем в варпе, ни один из наследничков Леди Теодоры нам уже не пригодится! Если Эдельтрад, как и я, еще не сдал ни разум, ни тело на милость варпу — значит, без нас еще продержится чуток!"

traits.locale_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, no number of Lady Theodora's heirs will be of use to us anymore!"
"Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, no number of Lady Theodora's heirs will be of use to us anymore!"

"Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, no amount of Lady Theodora's heirs will be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

"Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, no amount of Lady Theodora's heirs will be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

"Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, no number of Lady Theodora's heirs will be of use to us anymore! If Edelthrad, like me, has not yet surrendered either mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold out a little without us!"

"Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

languages.text: “先别着急，老家伙！要是我们被亚空间吞没了，就算再来几个西奥多拉夫人的继承人也没用！如果艾德萨德和我一样，还没有被亚空间彻底吞噬的话，那就算我们不在，他也一样可以再坚持一阵子！”
languages.original_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

traits.locale_text: “先别着急，老家伙！要是我们被亚空间吞没了，那无论来多少西奥多拉夫人的继承人都没用！如果艾德萨德和我一样，还没有被亚空间彻底吞噬的话，那就算我们不在，他也一样可以再坚持一阵子！”

languages.text: «¡Alto ahí, anciano! ¡Si naufragamos en la disformidad, los herederos de lady Theodora no nos servirán de nada! Si Edelthrad, al igual que yo, aún no ha abandonado su mente y su cuerpo a la disformidad, ¡podrá aguantar un poco más sin nosotros!».
languages.original_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto ahí, anciano! ¡Si naufragamos en la disformidad, ninguno de los herederos de lady Theodora nos servirá de nada! Si Edelthrad, al igual que yo, aún no ha abandonado su mente y su cuerpo a la disformidad, ¡podrá aguantar un poco más sin nosotros!».

languages.text: 「落ち着いて、おじちゃん！<歪み>に溺れてしまったら、シオドーラ様の跡継ぎがいても意味ないよ！エデルスラドがあたいと同じで、まだ身も心も<歪み>の力に屈服していないなら、あたい達がいなくても彼はまだもう少し持ちこたえられる！」
languages.original_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着いて、おじいさん！<歪み>に溺れてしまったら、レディ・テオドラの跡継ぎが何人いても、私たちには役に立たないよ！エデルスラドが私と同じで、まだ心も体もワープの慈悲に屈服していないなら、私達がいなくても彼はまだもう少し持ちこたえられる！」
「落ち着いて、おじちゃん！<歪み>に溺れてしまったら、シオドーラ様の跡継ぎがいても意味ないよ！エデルスラドがあたいと同じで、まだ身も心も<歪み>の力に屈服していないなら、あたい達がいなくても彼はまだもう少し持ちこたえられる！」

languages.original_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

languages.text: « Pas si vite, vieillard ! Les héritiers de dame Théodora ne nous serviront pas à grand-chose si on se noie dans le Warp ! Si Edelthrad est comme moi et qu'il n'a pas encore abandonné son esprit ou son corps à l'Immaterium, il tiendra bien encore un peu sans nous ! »
languages.original_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

traits.locale_text: « Pas si vite, vieillard ! Les héritiers de dame Théodora ne nous serviront pas à grand-chose si on se noie dans le Warp ! Si Edelthrad est comme moi et qu'il n'a pas encore abandonné son esprit ou son corps à l'Immaterium, il tiendra bien encore un peu sans nous ! »

languages.text: "Nicht so schnell, alter Mann! Wenn wir im Warp ertrinken, werden uns Lady Theodoras Erben nichts nützen. Wenn Edelthrad so ist wie ich und sein Geist oder Körper nicht dem Warp zum Opfer gefallen sind, kann er auch ohne uns noch eine Weile durchhalten!"
languages.original_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht so schnell, alter Mann! Wenn wir im Warp ertrinken, nützen uns Lady Theodoras Erben gar nichts, so viele es auch sein mögen! Wenn Edelthrad so ist wie ich und sein Geist oder Körper nicht dem Warp zum Opfer gefallen sind, kann er auch ohne uns noch eine Weile durchhalten!"

languages.text: "Dur biraz ihtiyar! Öteboyutta boğulursak Leydi Theodora'nın vârislerinin bize hiç faydası olmaz! Edelthrad da benim gibi zihniyle bedenini henüz öteboyutun merhametine teslim etmediyse yardımımız olmadan biraz daha dayanabilir!"
languages.original_text: "Not so fast, old man! If we drown in the warp, Lady Theodora's heirs won't be any good to us! If Edelthrad's like me and hasn't yet surrendered his mind or body to the mercy of the warp, then he can still hold on a little longer without us!"

traits.locale_text: "Dur biraz ihtiyar! Öteboyutta boğulursak Leydi Theodora'nın vârislerinin bize hiç faydası olmaz! Edelthrad da benim gibi zihniyle bedenini henüz öteboyutun merhametine teslim etmediyse yardımımız olmadan biraz daha dayanabilir!"
